alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 4:28PM EST until January 17 at 8:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Nassau, Southern Westchester, Richmond (Staten Island), Bronx, Northern Nassau, Northern Queens, Southern Queens, New York (Manhattan) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
